actions.text: Referred to House Committee on The Judiciary.

official_title: A bill to provide that section 6248 of title 10, United States Code, shall not apply to an award of a medal of honor to Francisco R. Cortez or Richard G. Perez, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Authorizes the President, notwithstanding certain time limitations for the awarding of medals, to award a medal of honor to Francisco Cortez and Richard Perez for services performed with the U.S. Marine Corps in Vietnam.

titles.title: A bill to provide that section 6248 of title 10, United States Code, shall not apply to an award of a medal of honor to Francisco R. Cortez or Richard G. Perez, and for other purposes.
